data.description:
Make Mycroft repeat whatever you want, Turn Mycroft into a parrot. Speak a phrase and listen to it repeated

* "Repeat that"
* "Can you repeat that?"
* "What...
examples: Tell me what I just said.

data.description:
A Mouse Jiggler prevents your computer from going to sleep while you work or play.

This skill creates constant mouse activity so your computer won't go idle and trigger screen savers or sleep mode—eliminating the need to log in repeatedly.
data.name: Mouse Jiggler Skill

data.description:
Allows you to send commands to mycroft by email

# Skill configuration

data.description:
Adds a bunch of patches at runtime, bringing fixes and new functionality for mycroft-core

Contributing to Mycroft is a bit of a fight with upstream

this skill applies a bunch of monkey patches at runtime to add/fix things not merged into mycroft-core, full details in...

data.description:
Tests that Monkey Patches skill is working

A second skill is required to verify patching worked, results from main skill would not reflect global state
